text: Blancs-Coteaux is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Marne department in northeast France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2018 and consists of the former communes of Vertus (the seat), Gionges, Oger and Voipreux.Arrêté préfectoral 21 December 2017 == Related pages == * Communes of the Marne department == References == Category:2018 establishments in France Category:Communes in Marne
title: Blancs-Coteaux
